title: Portrait Photography
about: Portrait photography is a very well-known and popular style of photography. This style of photography is all about trying to capture the personality, identity, soul, and emotions of a person by utilizing the background atmosphere, poses, and lighting.A portrait can also refer to the orientation of a photograph and is the opposite of a landscape photograph.
